channel.title: Distributive Justice on Vivek Nallur
channel.description: Recent content in Distributive Justice on Vivek Nallur

item.title: AAMAS'16 Paper Accepted
item.description:
Our paper entitled “Algorithm-Diversity: A Mechanism for Distributive Justice in a Socio-Technical MAS” accepted at AAMAS’2016 Yaay!

I’ll put up a pre-print copy of the paper in the research section of the site. In the meantime, if you just can’t wait, send me an email.
